dct_description_sm: Indian Territory map shows Indian nations and their land boundaries, township grid, railroads, trails, settlements, military posts and reservations, watershed, and notable physical features.
Colorado map shows township grid, Indian reservations, railroads, counties, cities, towns, military posts, watershed, mountain passes, and notable physical features.
Colorado map on front of sheet; Indian Territory map on verso. Does not include the Oklahoma Panhandle.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map in miles.
Includes notes with volume and page no. references to treaties.
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the Year 1880 by S. Augustus Mitchell in the Office of the Librarian of Congress at Washington."
